title: Dump array of char* ASCII text to file? (ollydbg or x32dbg)
content:
This question is similar to: List arrays (de-reference pointers) in Ollydbg

I have an array of pointers that point to character arrays. I followed the above link and can view the ASCII values from the dereferenced pointers, but I would like to be able to dump it to a file. The only options I see are:

  1. Binary copy (these are the addresses, rather than values).
  2. Copy as Table (copies all the data...not needed)

Any idea? I use both ollydbg and x32dbg so either is fine for a solution

answers_data.content: in ollydbg you can drag the columns to left and hide them and copy only text
